text: Let's Play in the World () is a 1971 Argentine musical comedy movie directed by María Herminia Avellaneda and starring Rodolfo Machado, Eva Franco, María Elena Walsh, Perla Santalla, Jorge Mayor, Hugo Caprera. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:1971 musical movies Category:Argentine comedy movies Category:Argentine musical movies Category:Movies directed by María Herminia Avellaneda
title: Let's Play in the World
